archimate:BusinessRole.name: Supporting roles
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: Supporting roles consists of the Tietoevry Tech Services normal operations units. Supporting roles will be requested to join in Crisis Management meetings when needed. Each specific role supports Crisis Management team in their responsible area and assign tasks and responsibilities depending on crisis. Supporting roles are from CIO, HR, Legal, Finance, Procurement, Facility, Risk, Security and Privacy, Vendor representative.
